Description:
Key Responsibilities:Greet customers warmly as they enter the establishment and guide them to their seats.
Present menus, offer beverage and food recommendations, and answer questions about menu items.
Take and process customer orders accurately, ensuring special requests or dietary preferences are noted.
Prepare a variety of beverages, including coffee (hot and cold), mocktails, smoothies, and juices, adhering to quality standards.
Collaborate with the kitchen staff to ensure accurate and prompt order delivery.
Serve orders to customers with attention to detail and presentation.
Follow health and safety guidelines to maintain a clean and sanitized work environment.
Complete tasks assigned by the manager, which may include restocking supplies, inventory management.Skills
Skills:
Prior experience as a Barista and Waiter/Waitress is a must.
Proficient in preparing various coffee beverages, cold drinks, mocktails, and juices.
Strong customer service skills with a friendly and approachable demeanor.
Excellent communication skills to interact effectively with customers and team members 
English is a must
